name: dreams (itch) (Ghina Al Halabi)
description:
A game about a person who dreams so much, but keeps stumbling upon obstacles pushing him away from his dreams. Although, the only way to reach the sky is to keep pushing back anyway.

How to play:

The player can only move in the green area, move the crate around to make green space.

Keep moving and try to reach the cloud. To move on to new levels, your player should be on top of the cloud.

The red obstacles destroy your crate.
Milestones give you crates.
